column1: AWS Pricing Calculator provides only an estimate of your AWS fees and doesn't include any taxes that might apply. Your actual fees depend on a variety of factors, including your actual usage of AWS services.

column2: The MySQL RDS database type were changed to db.r5.2xlarge. It was assumed that, this change will not have much impact on the application. Number and size of EC2 instances were decreased by 6 and 300GB respectively in the initial estimation it was assumed to make the application more accebile and confertable. Size of S3 buckets were reduced from 500 GB to 300GB each so that we are able to mantain alloted budget accordignly.
